description: Prune 2 Plane trees in rear garden of No.34 and Poplar tree in rear garden of No.33.Trees subject to TPO Islington No.1 1956  Part of GI - Works: Poplar - Clean up stem and lift to 20' approx.Reduce height by a quarter and reshape - Plane (Corner of garden) - Reduce height by up to 8' above the old pollard.Treat cavity and reshape - Plane (leaning over river)  a)Remove 4 short stems on trunk on garden side and  clean up trunk.  b)Remove lower branch over river bank to the main  trunk.  c)Remove 2 of the 3 smaller outer branches on the  other side to the south.Reduce the third branch  by one half.  d)Reduce the height of the remaining crown by 25%.  Deadwood  thin and reshape leaving a pleasant crown
decision_conditions: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
